Html:
Hi

I am using the Google Map Provider for internal company use. We have our own Client Key in our company. We use the free key with limited usage / queries per day.
I am trying to find where in the GMAP Core Sourcecode do we place our Client Key string?
Iwould be very grateful if you can point me in the right direction please?

Len

check GoogleMapProvider.cs

you can add your key in: MakeGeocoderUrl/MakeReverseGeocoderUrl/MakeDirectionsUrl

and there is different parameters if you use Google Maps API for Work: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/business/webservices/auth

and it's not implemented yet, but i'll check it, google change their stuff far too often..

Many thanks Radioman

I found the class and added the key, and will test it after I compiled the core DLL later.
We do not use the Google Maps API for Work, but I am sure others out there might at some point.
:-)
ok, Maps API for Work is implemented now
